fields.description:
I am using Tableview inside that refreshcontrol..when i come to this page and do pulltorefresh multiple times and go back then come then app crashes..Getting below error message in Xcode 


*TiUITableViewRowProxy object 0x10691f200 overreleased while already deallocating; break on objc_overrelease_during_dealloc_error to debug*

Please help to resolve this issue..
